name: Eddie Isin
text: I've ordered delivery from this store about a dozen times and today there was a mistake with my order. I called and spoke with the manager on duty, they were polite and understanding and took care of the issue. I'm posting for the previous â€¦More

name: Flip Issa
text: It's Pizza Hut, nothing extra special at this location other than the fabulous tasting pizza. It's tucked away in a rather dark plaza when you go on a late night dinner run. This isn't a bad area but it's always good to be on the lookout. I'm giving the full 5 stars because my food has always been accurate, fresh and tastes great.

name: Shannon Calle
text: I always order from here and never have a problem but today I get an attitude after calling the store, with no answer 5X, for curbside. Why have curbside if you aren't going to answer the phone?

name: Jeremy Carroll
text: I honestly had no idea this was even back there. Location has good parking. Walked in and I was suprised how cool and clean the place was. Staff was nice, made some jokes together, and left telling me to have a good day. They won me over and I'll return when I want pizza again.

name: Joe Ferrante
text: This Pizza hut gives the worst ETA's for food. The manager is flat out rude and does it with a smile. Just because you smile does not negate the fact that you lack customer service skills... I am still standing in the store ) over an hour after my pick up order was placed.

name: Jamie Peebles
text: I cannot thank this store enough. If I could give 100 stars I would. I always order from here since we moved to tampa and they have always been exceptional. Tonight I almost cried Denise was our driver and my husband dropped the pizza all â€¦More
